_comment1: 'MVSF' contains Server Config Information for MVSF

MVSF._comment1: If your server is using SSL, rename '_SSL' to 'SSL'
MVSF._comment2: If your server is running REST AND requires a prefix to endpoint rename _REST to REST, and specify Prefix
MVSF._comment3: This will be your authentication Key you will pass from the website to allow scene editing

_comment3: 'SQL' contains SQL Config Data used by MVSQL. Currently only support 'MSSQL'
